title: anndnk
author: anndnk
content: Loan for any needLoan rate no more than 3% per monthFor citizens of the whole world up to 1 BTCOnly 18+Details by mail or telegram @CrybtoBTC_adm

comments.author: zazarb
comments.body: Quote from: anndnk on May 18, 2022, 07:00:59 PMLoan for any needLoan rate no more than 3% per monthFor citizens of the whole world up to 1 BTCOnly 18+Details by mail or telegram @CrybtoBTC_admIf you are trying to get personal information, it is illegal here.

comments.author: Timelord2067
comments.body: Quote from: anndnk on May 18, 2022, 07:00:59 PMLoan for any needLoan rate no more than 3% per monthFor citizens of the whole world up to 1 BTCOnly 18+Details by mail or telegram @CrybtoBTC_admLoan request Amount: BTC 0.0011Reason for loan: Recharge Lightning Network Channel.Length of loan: One calender month from date of funding.Repayment amount: BTC 0.001133Funding wallet address: bc1qa3n5r8mpfnl5r4hjje3rsnsf6acsxj282k7jnlCollateral:  None asked for, but if requested, I can furnish 125% in either ETH or DOGE but would have to insist that the collateral be held by an escrow as your UID was created in 2019, has never posted and woke up to create this thread.Are you 18+?: Yes.  My forum profile is nine years old and it would be reasonable to assume that even if I were the minimum age (13 years of age) required to sign up for the forum, it stands to reason I am now at least 18 years old.

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: @Timelord2067, lol.  Don't hold your breath about getting that loan.This:Quote from: anndnk on May 18, 2022, 07:00:59 PMOnly 18+Should tell you all you need to know about this request.  It's obviously a phishing expedition.Also, the scammer is too lazy to scam anyone here, he want's to do it conveniently on Telescam.Quote from: anndnk on May 18, 2022, 07:00:59 PMDetails by mail or telegram @CrybtoBTC_admBut, I figure you're doing a little bit of fishing yourself, of course.

comments.author: Timelord2067
comments.body: Quote from: DireWolfM14 on May 24, 2022, 01:38:14 AM@Timelord2067, lol.  Don't hold your breath about getting that loan.But, I figure you're doing a little bit of fishing yourself, of course.  Ya never know, it could be legit. Then again, it is a fine day out - might go to the beach and do a little bit of whale watching ...

comments.author: anndnk
comments.body: Quote from: zazarb on May 18, 2022, 09:38:33 PMQuote from: anndnk on May 18, 2022, 07:00:59 PMLoan for any needLoan rate no more than 3% per monthFor citizens of the whole world up to 1 BTCOnly 18+Details by mail or telegram @CrybtoBTC_admIf you are trying to get personal information, it is illegal here.I am not asking for personal information. It is enough to pass the KYC on any site and provide confirmation.I need to be sure that the person really exists.

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: Quote from: anndnk on June 02, 2022, 06:28:21 PMQuote from: zazarb on May 18, 2022, 09:38:33 PMQuote from: anndnk on May 18, 2022, 07:00:59 PMLoan for any needLoan rate no more than 3% per monthFor citizens of the whole world up to 1 BTCOnly 18+Details by mail or telegram @CrybtoBTC_admIf you are trying to get personal information, it is illegal here.I am not asking for personal information. It is enough to pass the KYC on any site and provide confirmation.I need to be sure that the person really exists.I am curious to know what you mean with "It is enough to pass the KYC on any site" ?I have passed it in several websites or service ...How you can prevent a scam if someone provide the same information from an account just created? It is ok if I will provide confirmation or a screen of this activity? How can you verify this information is real unless receiving documents of someone?

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Quote from: anndnk on June 02, 2022, 06:28:21 PMI am not asking for personal information. It is enough to pass the KYC on any site and provide confirmation.Just curious, did you notice TimeLord2067's loan application?  Did he qualify, and was his loan granted?  If not, can you please explain why not?Quote from: anndnk on June 02, 2022, 06:28:21 PMI need to be sure that the person really exists.Before I provide information proving that I'm over 18 years of age, can you prove that the coins exist?  A signed message using an address with some funds would be good.
